title: Simple Sans-Serif Font I Can't Identify Exactly
content:
Hi,

whatthefont was unhelpful with this one. I need an exact match. Thanks for any help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090816211904im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-5_4794.jpg)
author: Fontophile

comments.content: Wow 7 mins! Color me super impressed. Thank you! It really helps me out.
